title: The name of my first dog
content: The name of my first dog is like my shoes
creator: rollieandmarilyn

title: Browser Tabs - want maximize default
content:
I enjoy Firefox as my primary browser and have for many years. However, it is just a tool and I don't want or shouldn't need to be a Mozilla geek to get things done.

Following a recent update Firefox now opens in what I will call "split-screen" mode as opposed to full screen. This is a nuisance. Yes, I know I can us a a function key BUT I SHOULDN'T HAVE TO AND I WON'T.

I am not technically illiterate, in fact I am a retired IT professional. I did try "preferences", help, etc. But if I have to look more than 5 minutes for an answer it's just not worth it. I have several alternatives for browsing.

So, please, tell me in very few steps how to change this default.

Thank you
creator: jlpalmer150

title: More sites do not display or function properly in Firefox
content: Lately, there are an increasing number of sites that do not display or function properly in Firefox. The recommended browsers are Edge and Chrome, both of these do display these sites properly, neither of which are my first choice as I have reservations of these two collecting personal data with out permission (illegal data collection).

title: Firefox not saving Bankwest PAN number when asked to
content: When I go to Bankwest online banking, I first put in an 8 digit PAN number and tick the box to SAVE this. Then I subsequently put in my password and the connection is correctly made. Next time I log in, the PAN number is never there. This is very inconvenient as obviously I have so many passwords, etc. to remember. when I used to use Safari, there was no problem. You do put a warning not to save this if the computer is available to multiple users but mine is not. Can you please help me?
creator: davivac

title: Unable to log into my hotmail account all of a sudden
content:

I cannot go to the site out of the blue after years of no issues. How can I resolve this issue? Anyone know whats going on?

Thank you.
